## Economist by :mortar_board: and data scientist by :heart: 

:::{#hero-heading}
Hi there, I'm Christoph!

As a graduate financial economist, I have acquired an extensive **hypothesis–driven** research and **problem–solving** expertise in **data wrangling**, **statistical analysis**, and **model development**.

As a data scienctist, I have experience in developing **business intelligence tools**, prototyping **data-driven products**, and designing **data architectures**.

As a product manager, I have experience in all areas of software development, including **project management**, **agile methods**, and **design thinking**.
:::
